data.question: What is the empirical formula of compound 1c?
data.answer: C49 H35 B Dy F13 N11 P S2

data.question: What method was used to treat the static correlation effects in the WFT calculations?
What is the principal magnetic axis orientation in the ground state of 1c?
data.answer: Almost collinear to the B–Dy−F direction

data.question: Is the magnetic behavior of 1c and 1o very similar to the reference building block [Dy(Tppy)F(pyridine)2]+?
What is the main difference in the electronic structure between 1c and 1o?
data.answer: The nature of the Kramers doublet is strongly altered by a different mixing of the MJ states in the excited states ES4–ES7.

data.question: What technique was used for data collection and processing in the single-crystal diffraction study?
What was the result of the SHAPE analysis for 1c and 1o?
data.answer: The dysprosium coordination spheres can be described as approximate capped square antiprisms.

data.question: Did the crystal of compound 1c change color upon irradiation with 532 nm light?
data.answer: Yes, from dark blue to colorless

data.question: What was the purpose of using the PLATON/SQUEEZE tool in the study?
data.answer: To treat the electron density of strongly disordered molecules in the lattice.

data.question: What was the main challenge in obtaining full data collection under 365 nm irradiation?
data.answer: Quick loss of the diffraction signal with time.

data.question: What was the effect of the neighboring Dy3+ centers in the solid-state structure of 1c and 1o?
data.answer: The magnetic interactions could be simply reduced to a coupling between the two magnetic dipoles.

data.question: Was the magnetic relaxation pathway slower in compound 1c compared to 1o?
data.answer: Yes, suggested by the larger transversal magnetic transition moment in ES3 for 1c.

data.question: What was the main solvent used in the synthesis of compound 1c?
What was the method used for the synthesis of ligand Lc?
Did the synthesis of 1c involve layering solutions of different compounds?
What was the yield of the synthesis of compound 1c?
Was the magnetic hysteresis behavior different between 1c and 1o below 5 K?
data.answer: Yes, differences in magnetic hysteresis behavior are clear for 1c and 1o below 5 K.

data.question: What was the main computational challenge in the study?
data.answer: The high computational cost of the WFT calculations.

data.question: Was the orientation of the principal magnetic axis in 1o very similar to 1c?
What was the main finding from the computational analysis regarding the magnetic properties of 1c and 1o?
data.answer: The Orbach mechanism is favored for the relaxation of the magnetization up to certain excited states.
